name: Overdrive
rules: Double movement for this turn.

name: Dash
rules: Move to adjacent tile.

name: Pulse Strike
rules: Deal 2 damage to all enemies in range 3.

name: Shield Bash
rules: Deal 1 damage and push enemy back 1.

name: Repair
rules: Heal 3 HP.

name: Energy Surge
rules: Gain 3 Energy.

name: Precision Shot
rules: Deal 3 damage to target. Cannot miss.

name: Retreat
rules: Move 2 tiles away from nearest enemy.

name: Rally
rules: All allies gain +1 Attack this turn.

name: Desperate Strike
rules: Deal 2 damage. If you have 5 or less HP, deal +2 damage.

name: Watchtower
rules: Provides +2 range to ranged attacks from this tile. Cost: 6 bricks (4 regular, 2 plates).

name: Barricade
rules: Blocks movement. +2 Defense to adjacent units. Cost: 4 bricks (3 regular, 1 plate).

name: Bridge
rules: Connects two tiles. Units can move across. Cost: 6 bricks (4 regular, 2 plates).

name: Turret Base
rules: Ranged attack: 2 damage, 4 range. Cost: 8 bricks (6 regular, 1 special).

name: Energy Core
rules: All adjacent units gain +1 Energy per turn. Cost: 7 bricks (4 regular, 2 plates, 1 special).

name: Healing Station
rules: Heal 2 HP to all adjacent units at end of turn. Cost: 5 bricks (3 regular, 1 plate, 1 special).

name: Auto-Repair
rules: Duration: 3 rounds. Heal 1 HP at start of each turn.

name: Seek and Destroy
rules: Duration: 2 rounds. +1 Attack against damaged enemies.

name: Retreat Loop
rules: Duration: 2 rounds. When damaged, move 1 tile away from attacker.

name: Overclock
rules: Duration: 2 rounds. +2 Energy per turn, take 1 Heat at end of turn.

name: Stealth Mode
rules: Duration: 3 rounds. Enemies cannot target you with ranged attacks.

name: System Overload
rules: All units take 1 damage. Energy costs are doubled this turn.

name: Security Breach
rules: All players draw 2 cards.

name: Treasure Cache
rules: Draw 3 cards and gain 2 Energy.

name: Power Surge
rules: All units gain +2 Energy.

name: Structural Collapse
rules: Destroy all structures. Return half their brick cost to shared pool.

name: Energy Core
rules: Permanent: +1 max Energy.

name: Shield Generator
rules: Permanent: +2 Defense.

name: Speed Boost
rules: Permanent: +1 Movement.

name: Weapon Upgrade
rules: Permanent: +1 Attack.

name: Sensor Array
rules: Permanent: +2 Range.

name: Crystal Shard
rules: Deal 2 damage to target. If it dies, gain 1 Energy.
limits_perDeck: The crystal's power flows through you.

name: Crystal Resonance
rules: Duration: 3 rounds. All spells have +1 range and deal +1 damage.

name: Crystal Focus
rules: All spells cost −1 Energy. When you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy. Cost: 6 bricks (4 regular, 1 plate, 1 special).

name: Crystal Wall
rules: Provides cover (+2 Defense) to adjacent units. Cost: 4 bricks (4 regular).
limits_perDeck: A shimmering barrier of pure crystal.

name: Mystic Turret
rules: Ranged attack: 3 damage, 3 range. Can target flying units. Cost: 8 bricks (6 regular, 1 plate, 1 special).
limits_perDeck: The turret channels arcane energy into devastating blasts.

name: Portal Gateway
rules: Allies can teleport to any other Portal Gateway. Cost: 12 bricks (8 regular, 2 plates, 2 special).
limits_perDeck: A gateway between distant points in space.

name: Lightning Bolt
rules: Deal 3 damage to target and 1 damage to all adjacent enemies.

name: Arcane Shield
rules: Gain 4 temporary HP.

name: Teleport
rules: Move to any tile within range 5.

name: Reality Rift
rules: All units are teleported to random tiles. Draw 2 cards.

name: Data Stream
rules: Draw 2 cards.

name: EMP Blast
rules: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Disable all enemy programs.

name: Overclock Field
rules: Attach to a friendly robot. +1 Energy per turn; at end of round take 1 Heat.

name: Cyber Turret
rules: Ranged attack: 2 damage, 4 range. Can target through walls. Cost: 7 bricks (4 regular, 2 plates, 1 special).

name: Data Core
rules: All adjacent units draw +1 card per turn. Cost: 8 bricks (5 regular, 2 plates, 1 special).

name: Firewall
rules: Blocks enemy movement. +1 Defense to adjacent units. Cost: 5 bricks (3 regular, 1 plate, 1 special).

name: Hack
rules: Target enemy loses 1 Energy and cannot play cards next turn.

name: Neural Link
rules: Duration: 3 rounds. You can see through walls.

name: Quantum Strike
rules: Deal 4 damage to target. Cannot be blocked.

name: System Crash
rules: All units lose 2 Energy. All programs are disabled.

name: Steam Vent
rules: Push all adjacent enemies 1 tile away.

name: Gear Grind
rules: Deal 2 damage to target. If it has armor, deal +1 damage.

name: Pressure Build
rules: Duration: 3 rounds. +1 Attack per turn. At end, deal 2 damage to all adjacent enemies.

name: Steam Turret
rules: Ranged attack: 2 damage, 3 range. Pushes target 1 tile. Cost: 7 bricks (4 regular, 2 plates, 1 special).

name: Boiler Room
rules: All adjacent units gain +1 Energy per turn. Cost: 10 bricks (6 regular, 3 plates, 1 special).

name: Gear Bridge
rules: Connects two tiles. Units gain +1 Movement when crossing. Cost: 8 bricks (4 regular, 2 plates, 2 special).

name: Clockwork Trap
rules: First enemy entering: 2 damage and Immobilized for 1 turn. Cost: 5 bricks (3 regular, 1 plate, 1 special).

name: Steam Overload
rules: Deal 3 damage to all enemies in range 2.

name: Gear Up
rules: Duration: 2 rounds. +1 Defense.

name: Industrial Sabotage
rules: All structures take 1 damage.

name: Seal the Breach
rules: Stage I: Control the center for 1 round. Stage II: Build a Gate on it. Reward: all allies draw 1; gain 2 Energy distributed.

name: Power Core
rules: Stage I: Build 3 structures. Stage II: Control the center for 2 rounds. Reward: +1 max Energy for all allies.

name: Data Recovery
rules: Stage I: Control 2 Data Cores for 1 round. Stage II: Draw 5 cards in one turn. Reward: All allies gain +1 max Energy.

name: Voltaic Storm
rules: Lasts 3 rounds. At round end, each unit in exposed tiles takes 1 damage (⚡). Sensors gain +1 range.

name: Steam Fog
rules: Lasts 2 rounds. All ranged attacks have -1 range.

name: Data Storm
rules: Lasts 3 rounds. All units gain +1 Energy per turn. Programs cost -1 Energy.

name: Magical Aurora
rules: Lasts 4 rounds. All spells cost -1 Energy. All units gain +1 max Energy.

name: Overlord's Pulse
rules: Two-step attack: (1) Push all enemies 1 and deal 2 damage. (2) If any hit a wall/structure, stun them.

name: Crystal Overload
rules: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. All structures take 2 damage.

name: System Override
rules: All enemy programs are disabled. All enemies lose 2 Energy.

name: Steam Explosion
rules: Deal 4 damage to all enemies in range 3. Destroy all structures in range 2.

name: Parry Matrix
rules: When your automaton would take damage, prevent 2. Gain 1 Energy if the attacker is adjacent.

name: Snapjaw Floor
rules: Arm on an adjacent tile. First enemy entering: 3 damage and Immobilized until end of round.

name: Nanite Repair Kit
rules: Heal 2 and remove one non-boss status.

name: Turret Blueprint: Mk I
rules: Your next Turret Structure this turn costs −1 Energy and may use 'turret_platform' without extra parts.
